input: Which one of the following is correctly matched about the outcome of the XVI Lok Sabha elections?

options.A: National Democratic Alliance — 336 seats and 35 percent vote share.
options.B: United Progressive Alliance — 54 seats and 23 per cent vote share.
options.C: Left Front — 10 seats and 4.8 per cent vote share.
options.D: Congress — 44 seats and 17 per cent vote share.

explanation: United Progressive Alliance-54 Seats and 23 percent vote share.
